description: A Door is a construction for closing an opening intended primarily for access or egress or both.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the Door.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the Door.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the Door.

properties.name: address
properties.description: Relates to the addresses that are assigned to the Door.
